headline: Todd's Famous Blueberry Pancakes
description: These fluffy blueberry pancakes are simple and delicious. Perfect for drizzling with maple syrup or topping with butter for a family-pleasing treat!

video.description: See how to make delicious blueberry pancakes from scratch.
video.name: Todd's Blueberry Pancakes

name: Todd's Famous Blueberry Pancakes

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt together in a large bowl. Combine milk and egg in a small bowl. Stir egg mixture into flour mixture until just combined. Stir in melted butter, then fold in blueberries. Set aside for 1 hour.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat.
Pour or scoop the batter onto the hot griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake; cook until bubbles appear on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown on both sides. Serve hot.
